snippet: Pakistan said Indian troops fired on a passenger bus on its side of the Line of Control in the disputed region, killing nine civilians....

byline.original: By HARI KUMAR and SALMAN MASOOD
byline.contributor: Hari Kumar reported from New Delhi, and Salman Masood from Islamabad, Pakistan. Geeta Anand contributed reporting from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: Pakistan said Indian troops fired on a passenger bus on its side of the Line of Control in the disputed region, killing nine civilians.

headline.main: Fighting Intensifies Between India and Pakistan on Kashmir Line of Control
headline.print_headline: Civilians and Soldiers Are Killed in Kashmir
